specific_question: How many IT service desk staff hours were spent on routine tasks in Q2 2024?
answer: Our IT service desk staff spent 500 hours on routine tasks, accounting for 30% of total hours worked.
justification: Quantifying routine task hours helps determine potential AI-driven automation benefits.
dr_question: How can we leverage ISTM and AI-driven analytics to minimize IT service desk workload and improve response times in MediConn Solutions?
